patterns: Where can I find my Order Details
responses: All your order related information can be viewed in ‘Orders’ section
We accept returns within 15 days from the delivery date. Please keep the entire package intact if you wish to return the product.
Once an order is cancelled, we cannot undo this. You will need to replace the order yourself.
I'm sorry you are unhappy with the product quality.Our customer care representative will work on your query. We typically reply within 24 hours.

patterns: When will the product come back in stock
responses: We keep on adding new products and designs everyday.You can check our website for our latest designs, offers and stock updates.
